Package shirmin

Class Deadline

  • java.lang.Object
    • shirmin.Task
      • shirmin.Deadline
  • public class Deadline
extends Task
    Represents a task with a deadline.

    Each Deadline object includes a description and a deadline time.

    • Field Summary

      protected java.time.LocalDateTime by

    • Field Detail

      • by

        protected java.time.LocalDateTime by

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deadline

        public Deadline​(java.lang.String description,
                java.lang.String by)
        Initializes a new Deadline object with a description and deadline time.

        The deadline time is parsed from a string into a LocalDateTime object. If parsing fails, the deadline time is set to null.

        Parameters:
        description - The description of the deadline task.
        by - The deadline time as a string in the format "yyyy-MM-dd HHmm".

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the Deadline task.

        The format includes the type of task ('[D]'), the description, and the deadline time.

        Overrides:
        toString in class Task
        Returns:
        String representing the Deadline task with its status, description, and deadline.

      • getBy

        public java.lang.String getBy()
        Returns the deadline time formatted as a string.

        The format of the returned string is "MMM dd yyyy HH:mm".

        Returns:
        Formatted string of the 'by' LocalDateTime field, or null if 'by' is null.
